channel.title: Redo-Webclient Tutorial
channel.description:
_______ Ok, So today im going to teach you how to create a webclient, Required things to make this: A website with html instertions, Copy+Paste Background URL/or use the default And YOUR servers ip dificulty level: 3/10 Ok, So First goto your website and make a page called "playnow" "webclient" or anything you want. On that page create a contet box with a HTML Insertation. In that put:FOR PROJECT INSANITY Quote PI
FOR DELTA:
Quote
___ Below is for average day nubs. vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv In one of those (what ever one you choose) Put your server name in the section that says "YOURSERVERNAME" in this line: & Put your ip address in the section that says"YOURSERVER IP" in this line: ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ __ The above is for your average day nubs :D __ xXxSkillerxXx

item.title: Redo-Webclient Tutorial
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

Ok, So today im going to teach you how to create a webclient,
Required things to make this:
A website with html instertions,
Copy+Paste
Background URL/or use the default
And YOUR servers ip
dificulty level: 3/10
Ok, So First goto your website and make a page called “playnow” “webclient” or anything you want.
On that page create a contet box with a HTML Insertation.
In that put:FOR PROJECT INSANITY
Quote

PI

FOR DELTA:

Quote 
<applet name=client width=765 height=503 archive='http://webclientjars.webs.com/Jars/WebclientJarTrendiScape.jar' code='client.class'>
<PARAM name='java_arguments' value='-Xmx700m'>
<PARAM name='server_name' value='YOURSERVERNAME'>
<PARAM name='detail' value='low'>
<PARAM name='ip' value='YOURSERVER IP'>
<PARAM name='port' value='43594'>
<PARAM name='background_image' value='http://webclientjars.webs.com/webbycreator.png'>
<PARAM name='headicons' value=''>
</applet></blockquote>

Below is for average day nubs.
vvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvv
In one of those (what ever one you choose)
Put your server name in the section that says “YOURSERVERNAME” in this line:

& Put your ip address in the section that says"YOURSERVER IP" in this line: ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ __ The above is for your average day nubs :D __ xXxSkillerxXx

Read full topic
